bibl.title: The Nile Flows Underground to Cyprus: The Painted Water-Cistern at Salamis Reconsidered.
Proceedings of the International Conference 'Egypt and Cyprus in Antiquity' (Nicosia, 3-6 April 2003)

bibl.seg: Whitehouse Helen, The Nile Flows Underground to Cyprus: The Painted Water-Cistern at Salamis Reconsidered.

D. Michaelides, Vasiliki Kassianidou and Robert S. Merrillees (Edd.), Proceedings of the International Conference 'Egypt and Cyprus in Antiquity' (Nicosia, 3-6 April 2003) (Oxford, 2009) pp. 252-260, 5 figg.
